name: Tiny Tykes by Grenadeware
description:
A third person colorful 3D cartoony character game suitable for most ages. There are 8 levels in the game.  It has challenges... In the game's main menu 'About' it explains exactly what the player needs to do :)

The reason we aren't putting on fixed prices is because some people who would like to play our games might be really battling financially. Please though kindly donate to us if you are able to as we do need support, thank you :) Our other 3 previously published games on itch.io have passwords for the zip files but the passwords are given. Please kindly donate to these other games if you are able to, thank you :)

Our patreon link is: https://www.patreon.com/grenadeware?fan_landing=true 

All music in the game is by Kevin Macleod on his Youtube creative commons channel Kevin Macleod Archive. Sounds from GameGuru, Soundbible.com and Freesound.org.

 On Youtube please subscribe, like and share our videos, thank you :)
